meta.name: description
meta.content: Docker image with Maven. Contribute to carlossg/docker-maven development by creating an account on GitHub.
Docker image with Maven. Contribute to carlossg/docker-maven development by creating an account on GitHub.

a.title:
Issue #11 Copy /usr/share/maven/ref/ contents into .m2 dir on startup
That way /root/.m2 can still be a volume and repository and settings can be pacakged in the image

a.class: issue-link js-issue-link

a.title:
Issue #11 Copy /usr/share/maven/ref/ contents into .m2 dir on startup
That way /root/.m2 can still be a volume and repository and settings can be pacakged in the image

div.a: Copy /usr/share/maven/ref/ contents into .m2 dir on startup
